parameters.name: ExpirePeriod
parameters.description: The number of remaining days for which the instances are available. Valid values: **0 to 180**.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query instances that have expired. Valid values:

*   **True**: queries instances that have expired.
*   **False**: does not query instances that have expired.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Valid values: any **non-zero** positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1 to 100**.

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to obtain the resource group ID.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag that is added to the instance. Each tag is a key-value pair that consists of two parts: TagKey and TagValue. You can specify a maximum of five tags in the following format for each request: `{"key1":"value1","key2":"value2"...}`.

parameters.name: proxyId
parameters.description: A deprecated parameter. You do not need to configure this parameter.
